abstract: Update | 8:19 p.m. After weeks of negotiations, I.B.M. withdrew its $7 billion bid for Sun Microsystems on Sunday, one day after Sun’s board balked at a reduced offer, The New York Times’s Steve Lohr and Ashlee Vance reported, citing three people close to the talks.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:19 p.m. After weeks of negotiations, I.B.M. withdrew its $7 billion bid for Sun Microsystems on Sunday, one day after Sun’s board balked at a reduced offer, The New York Times’s Steve Lohr and Ashlee Vance reported, citing three people close to the talks.
